Class CvtrPrefs

java.lang.Object
CvtrPrefs
public class CvtrPrefs
extends java.lang.Object
The Convertator Preferences maintains information about equation result fields so that the base and units may be changed easily.

  • Method Details

    • getPreferences

      public boolean getPreferences()
      Read preferences from the user's file. If the file does not already exist, create it. Otherwise, parse the preferences and set their values.
      Returns:
      boolean True if successful, otherwise false.

    • setPreferences

      public void setPreferences()
      Open an interactive window for the user to set preferences.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Close the preferences dialog window.
